amendment.description: To establish a project delivery program under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 for water storage infrastructure projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2279, under the order of 8/4/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 50. Record Vote Number: 305.

action.text: Amendment SA 2279 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5816-5817; text: 8/2/2021 CR S5675-5676) To establish a project delivery program under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 for water storage infrastructure projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2279 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2137.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2279, under the order of 8/4/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 50. Record Vote Number: 305.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2279, under the order of 8/4/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 50. Record Vote Number: 305.
